name: Quack Therapy
description:
CONTROLS:

Use WASD to move 

Use ESCAPE to pause

Use Q to turn off the television.

Use the MOUSE for everything else

WHERE AM I?

In an office out of time, a DUCK with a DOCTORATE DEGREE presents you with a series of POINTLESS MINIGAMES. Dance, drive, fight, defend, pop, and do so much more while you undergo treatment.

QUACK THERAPY was created in 48 hours, for the 2020 48 HOUR CHALLENGE, at the College for Creative Studies, in Detroit Michigan.

WHO MADE THIS?

BRENDAN ROARTY - Code, 3D Art, Sprites

DILLAN MURILLO - Trailer,  Sound, 3D Animation

MARISSA BOROWSKI- 3D Art, Sprites, Sound

MADELINE PAPPAS - 2D Artist, Sprites

SARAH KOSCO - Art, code, Sprites

JAMES CANNIZZARO - Code, Art, Rigging, Sound, Sprites

Thanks to Freesound, Kevin Macleod, and Youtube uploaders for the sound resources.

Thanks to Dave Bentley for the granola bars and moral support.
